verbose_text: It was reported that miR-24 can dicer-dependently bind to the 3 ' untranslated region of CYP11B1 (11beta-hydroxylase) and CYP11B2 (aldosterone synthase) genes and can post-transcriptionally regulate the expression of these two genes to modulate cortisol and aldosterone production [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: miR-24 can dicer-dependently bind to the 3' untranslated region of CYP11B1 (11beta-hydroxylase) and CYP11B2
